___RunningJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which are running in an ExecutionEnvironment

___SuspendedJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs that started to execute, but are now suspended

___StagingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs staging files before or after execution

___WaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which are waiting to start executing

___TotalJobs.description: The total number of Grid jobs known to the system

___JobDescription.description: Supported job description languages - JobDescription_t (open Enumeration)

___PreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs managed by the Grid software, but not yet passed to the LRMS
